summary.span: 将可枚举的集合和字典支持进行了统一，可用于公开 XAML 名称范围中名称的字典。

span.span: Unifies enumerable, collection, and dictionary support that are useful for exposing a dictionary of names in a XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不定义自己的成员。 defines no members of its own. 相反, 接口会继承 和泛型接口, 并将和 (或其中的) 作为约束。Instead, the interface inherits , and generic interfaces, with and (or a thereof) as constraints. 还继承。 also inherits . 接口在内部用作信息传递类型, 作为 WPF XAML 实现的对象编写器上下文的一部分。The interface is used internally as a type for information passing, as part of object writer context for the WPF XAML implementation.
